title: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 could feature the same telephoto camera as the Galaxy S22 series
content:
Samsung will launch its fourth-gen foldables — the Galaxy Z Fold 4 and Galaxy Z Flip 4 — sometime later this year. While the company hasn’t shared any details about the devices so far, recent leaks suggest that the Galaxy Z Fold 4 could feature an integrated S Pen like the Galaxy S22 Ultra. If

The post The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 could feature the same telephoto camera as the Galaxy S22 series appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A new leak about Samsung's upcoming Galaxy Z Fold 4 suggests that it could feature the same 3x telephoto camera as the Galaxy S22 series.
